trans-unit.source: The DirectoryEntry class encapsulates a node or object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: La classe DirectoryEntry incapsula un nodo o un oggetto nella gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use this class for binding to objects, or reading and updating attributes.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa classe per l'associazione agli oggetti, o la lettura e aggiornamento degli attributi.

trans-unit.source: DirectoryEntry, along with helper classes, provides support for life-cycle management and navigation methods.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryEntry, insieme a classi di supporto, fornisce supporto per il ciclo di vita metodi di gestione e la navigazione.

trans-unit.source: These include creating, deleting, renaming, moving a child node, and enumerating children.
trans-unit.target: Queste includono la creazione, eliminazione, ridenominazione, spostamento di un nodo figlio e l'enumerazione di elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: After you modify a node, you must commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver modificato un nodo, è necessario eseguire il commit delle modifiche in modo da poter salvare la struttura ad albero.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: DirectoryEntry can be used to access regular entries and some, but not all, information from schema entries.
trans-unit.target: DirectoryEntry può essere utilizzato per accedere normali movimenti e alcuni, ma non tutte le voci dello schema.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy contains up to several thousand nodes.
trans-unit.target: La gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory contiene fino a diverse migliaia di nodi.

trans-unit.source: Each node represents an object, such as a network printer or a user in a domain.
trans-unit.target: Ogni nodo rappresenta un oggetto, ad esempio una stampante di rete o un utente in un dominio.

trans-unit.source: Corporate networks constantly change as new employees are hired and objects such as network printers and computers are added.
trans-unit.target: Reti aziendali cambiano continuamente l'assunzione di nuovi dipendenti e gli oggetti, ad esempio le stampanti di rete e i computer vengono aggiunti.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) technology provides ways to programmatically add these objects to the directory tree.
trans-unit.target: La tecnologia Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) fornisce metodi per l'albero di directory a livello di codice aggiungere questi oggetti.

trans-unit.source: To create a directory entry in the hierarchy, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per creare una voce di directory nella gerarchia, utilizzare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> property is a collection that provides an <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> method, through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>proprietà è una raccolta che fornisce un <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>metodo l'aggiunta di un nodo raccolta direttamente sotto il nodo padre che si è attualmente associati.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiunge un nodo alla raccolta, è necessario specificare un nome per il nuovo nodo e il nome di un modello di schema che si desidera associare al nodo.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Potrebbe ad esempio, si desidera utilizzare uno schema denominato "Computer" per aggiungere nuovi computer alla gerarchia.

trans-unit.source: This class also contains attribute caching, which can be useful for optimizing network traffic.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe contiene inoltre la memorizzazione nella cache di attributo, che può essere utile per ottimizzare il traffico di rete.

trans-unit.source: To use attribute caching, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare la memorizzazione nella cache di attributo, vedere il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The classes associated with the DirectoryEntry component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers.
trans-unit.target: Le classi associate al componente DirectoryEntry è utilizzabile con i provider di servizi di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT.
trans-unit.target: Alcuni provider correnti sono WinNT, Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NDS NetWare Directory Service () e Internet Information Services (IIS).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using this class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Si presuppone di disporre di una conoscenza generale di servizi di dominio Active Directory prima di utilizzare questa classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName>Panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class that binds to the specified native Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe associato all'oggetto servizi di dominio Active Directory nativo specificato.

trans-unit.source: This constructor enables a program to use the methods and properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class on a native Active Directory Domain Services object that implements the IADs interface through a native API.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore consente di utilizzare i metodi e proprietà di un programma di <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>classe in un oggetto nativo di servizi di dominio Active Directory che implementa l'interfaccia IADs tramite un'API nativa.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'interfaccia IADs, vedere l'argomento [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The name of the native Active Directory Domain Services object to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'oggetto servizi di dominio Active Directory nativo da associare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class that binds this instance to the node in Active Directory Domain Services located at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe che associa questa istanza al nodo in servizi di dominio Active Directory si trova nel percorso specificato.

trans-unit.source: The path at which to bind the DirectoryEntry to the directory.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso in cui associare la voce della directory nella directory.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>proprietà viene inizializzata su questo valore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The path of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso di questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>proprietà viene inizializzata su questo valore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>

trans-unit.source: The user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: Il nome utente da utilizzare per l'autenticazione del client.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*>proprietà viene inizializzata su questo valore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*>

trans-unit.source: The password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: La password da utilizzare per autenticare il client.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*>proprietà viene inizializzata su questo valore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The path of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso di questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>proprietà viene inizializzata su questo valore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Path*>

trans-unit.source: The user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: Il nome utente da utilizzare per l'autenticazione del client.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*>proprietà viene inizializzata su questo valore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username*>

trans-unit.source: The password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: La password da utilizzare per autenticare il client.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*>proprietà viene inizializzata su questo valore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.AuthenticationType*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.AuthenticationType*>proprietà viene inizializzata su questo valore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.AuthenticationType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of authentication to use.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il tipo di autenticazione da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: Prior to [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the default value is <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>.
trans-unit.target: Prima di [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], il valore predefinito è <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>

trans-unit.source: Beginning with [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the default value is <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>.
trans-unit.target: A partire da [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], il valore predefinito è <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AuthenticationTypes"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le voci figlio del nodo nella gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The child entries are only the immediate children of this node.
trans-unit.target: Le voci figlio sono solo gli elementi figlio immediati del nodo.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to find, retrieve, or create a directory entry in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per trovare, recuperare o creare una voce di directory nella gerarchia.

trans-unit.source: This property is a collection that, along with the usual iteration capabilities, provides an <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> method through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è una raccolta che, insieme alle funzionalità di iterazione consueto, fornisce un <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>metodo tramite cui si aggiunge un nodo alla raccolta direttamente sotto il nodo padre che si è attualmente associati.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiunge un nodo alla raccolta, è necessario specificare un nome per il nuovo nodo e il nome di un modello di schema che si desidera associare al nodo.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Potrebbe ad esempio, si desidera utilizzare uno schema denominato "Computer" per aggiungere nuovi computer alla gerarchia.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, changes are made locally to a cache.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per impostazione predefinita, le modifiche vengono apportate localmente in una cache.

trans-unit.source: After you modify or add a node, you must call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method to commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver modificato o aggiungere un nodo, è necessario chiamare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>per eseguire il commit delle modifiche in modo da poter salvare la struttura ad albero.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> before calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Se si chiama <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache>prima di chiamare <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, delle modifiche non salvate per la cache delle proprietà andranno perse.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> methods, and the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache>metodi e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries"></xref> object containing the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries"> </xref> oggetto contenente le voci figlio del nodo nella gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Closes the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object and releases any system resources that are associated with this component.
trans-unit.target: Chiude il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> dell'oggetto e rilascia le risorse di sistema che sono associate a questo componente.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to release unmanaged system resources, without waiting for garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo per rilasciare le risorse di sistema non gestite, senza attendere che l'operazione di garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: Following a call to Close, any operations on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> might raise exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Segue una chiamata a Close, tutte le operazioni di <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>possono generare eccezioni.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: Saves changes that are made to a directory entry to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Salva le modifiche apportate a una voce di directory nell'archivio directory sottostante.

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, le modifiche alle proprietà vengono apportate in locale in una cache, e vengono memorizzati nella cache dopo la prima di leggere i valori delle proprietà da leggere.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the cache include changes to the properties as well as calls to <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A> (if this is the newly created entry).
trans-unit.target: Le modifiche apportate alla cache includono le modifiche apportate alle proprietà e chiamate a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>(se si tratta della voce appena creata).</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntries.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If you call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> before calling CommitChanges, any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Se si chiama <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>prima di chiamare CommitChanges, eventuali modifiche non salvate per la cache delle proprietà andranno perse.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: Security - Use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission> class for reading, writing, deleting, changing, and adding to the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Sicurezza: utilizzo di <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission>classe per la lettura, scrittura, eliminazione, modifica e aggiunta alla gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission>

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess>.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess>

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this entry as a child of the specified parent.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia di questa voce come figlio dell'elemento padre specificato.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> on the new object to make the copy permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>è `true`, chiamare <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>sul nuovo oggetto per rendere permanente la copia.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider does not currently support the CopyTo method.
trans-unit.target: Il provider di Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) non supporta attualmente il metodo CopyTo.

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that will be the parent for the copy that is being created.
trans-unit.target: Il nome distinto del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto che verrà utilizzato l'elemento padre per la copia da creare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the copy of this entry as a child of the new parent.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta la copia di questa voce come figlio del nuovo elemento padre.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> non è un contenitore.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object, as a child of the specified parent <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object, with the specified new name.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia di questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto, come figlio dell'elemento padre specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto, con il nuovo nome specificato.

trans-unit.source: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider does not currently support this method.
trans-unit.target: Il provider di Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) attualmente non supporta questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> on the new object to make the copy permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>è `true`, chiamare <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>sul nuovo oggetto per rendere permanente la copia.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DN of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that will be the parent for the copy that is being created.
trans-unit.target: Nome distinto del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto che verrà utilizzato l'elemento padre per la copia da creare.

trans-unit.source: The name of the copy of this entry.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della copia di questa voce.

trans-unit.source: A renamed copy of this entry as a child of the specified parent.
trans-unit.target: Una copia rinominata della voce come figlio dell'elemento padre specificato.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto non è un contenitore.

trans-unit.source: Deletes this entry and its entire subtree from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Elimina questa voce e tutto il relativo sottoalbero dalla gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Of the Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) system-supplied providers, only the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) currently supports this operation.
trans-unit.target: Provider fornito dal sistema Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI), solo l'accesso protocollo LDAP (Lightweight Directory) supporta attualmente questa operazione.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The entry and its entire subtree are deleted from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Vengono eliminati la voce e tutto il relativo sottoalbero dalla gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Security - Use <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission> for deleting entries from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Sicurezza - utilizzare <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission>per l'eliminazione di voci dalla gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermission>

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione associata: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesPermissionAccess?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> non è un contenitore.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elimina le risorse (ad eccezione di memoria) che vengono utilizzate per il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>metodo e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>richiama il metodo Dispose protetto con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A></xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro `true`, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>i riferimenti all'oggetto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods, see [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodi, vedere [si esegue l'override del metodo Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified path represents an actual entry in the directory service.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il percorso specificato rappresenta una voce effettiva nel servizio directory.

trans-unit.source: The path of the entry to verify.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso della voce da verificare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified path represents a valid entry in the directory service; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il percorso specificato rappresenta una voce valida nel servizio di directory; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il GUID del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When binding to an object in Active Directory Domain Services, use the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.NativeGuid%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando si associa a un oggetto in servizi di dominio Active Directory, utilizzare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.NativeGuid%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.NativeGuid%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> structure that represents the GUID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Guid>struttura che rappresenta il GUID del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Calls a method on the native Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: Chiama un metodo sull'oggetto servizi di dominio Active Directory nativo.

trans-unit.source: If the return value of the native method implements the IADs interface, a corresponding <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore restituito del metodo nativo implementa l'interfaccia IADs, un corrispondente <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>viene restituito.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'interfaccia IADs, vedere l'argomento [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del metodo da richiamare.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Object> objects that contains the arguments of the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref:System.Object>gli oggetti che contiene gli argomenti del metodo da richiamare.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The return value of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito del metodo richiamato.

trans-unit.source: The native method threw a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo nativo ha generato un <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>eccezione.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>

trans-unit.source: The native method threw a <xref:System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo nativo ha generato un <xref:System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException>eccezione.</xref:System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property contains a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> exception that contains information about the actual error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>proprietà contiene un <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>eccezione che contiene informazioni sull'errore effettivo che si è verificato.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a property from the native Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una proprietà dall'oggetto servizi di dominio Active Directory nativo.

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non deve essere utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> property should be used to access the properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>proprietà deve essere utilizzata per accedere alle proprietà del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>oggetto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to get.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della proprietà da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the requested property.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che rappresenta la proprietà richiesta.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on the native Active Directory Domain Services object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta una proprietà sull'oggetto servizi di dominio Active Directory nativo.

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non deve essere utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> property should be used to access the properties of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>proprietà deve essere utilizzata per accedere alle proprietà del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>oggetto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to set.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della proprietà da impostare.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory Domain Services object to set.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto di servizi di dominio Active Directory da impostare.

trans-unit.source: Moves this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object to the specified parent.
trans-unit.target: Sposta questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto nell'elemento padre specificato.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method on the new object to make the move permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>è `true`, chiamare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>metodo sul nuovo oggetto per rendere permanente lo spostamento.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parent to which you want to move this entry.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento padre a cui si desidera spostare la voce.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> non è un contenitore.

trans-unit.source: Moves this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object to the specified parent and changes its name to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Sposta questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto nell'elemento padre specificato e imposta il nome per il valore specificato.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> on the new object to make the move permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>è `true`, chiamare <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>sul nuovo oggetto per rendere permanente lo spostamento.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parent to which you want to move this entry.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento padre a cui si desidera spostare la voce.

trans-unit.source: The new name of this entry.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo nome di questa voce.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> is not a container.
trans-unit.target: Specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> non è un contenitore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the object as named with the underlying directory service.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell'oggetto specificato con il servizio directory sottostante.

trans-unit.source: This name, along with <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A>, distinguishes this entry from its siblings and must be unique among its siblings in each container.
trans-unit.target: Il nome, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A>, consente di distinguere questa voce dagli elementi di pari livello e deve essere univoco tra elementi di pari livello in ogni contenitore.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaClassName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the object as named with the underlying directory service.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'oggetto specificato con il servizio directory sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>, as returned from the provider.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il GUID del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>, come restituito dal provider.

trans-unit.source: Use the NativeGuid property when binding an object in Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà NativeGuid durante l'associazione di un oggetto in servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider returns the globally unique identifier of a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> in a different format than the Internet Information Services (IIS), Novell NetWare Directory Server (NDS), and WinNT providers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Provider il Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) restituisce l'identificatore univoco globale di una <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>in un formato diverso da quello di Internet Information Services (IIS), Novell NDS NetWare Directory Server () e provider WinNT.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> structure that represents the GUID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>, as returned from the provider.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Guid>struttura che rappresenta il GUID del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>, come restituito dal provider.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the native Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto di Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) nativo.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to cast the native Active Directory Domain Services object, which implements the IADs interface, when you want to use a COM interface.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per il cast dell'oggetto servizi di dominio Active Directory nativo, che implementa l'interfaccia IADs, quando si desidera utilizzare un'interfaccia COM.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'interfaccia IADs, vedere l'argomento [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp).

trans-unit.source: This object is for advanced scenarios that cannot be accomplished with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName> classes alone.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto è per scenari avanzati che non possono essere eseguiti con il <xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName>sole classi.</xref:System.DirectoryServices?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To use it, you need to import one of the COM interfaces from the IADs family, then cast this property to that interface.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzarla, è necessario importare una delle interfacce COM dalla famiglia IADs, eseguire il cast di questa proprietà su tale interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: The native ADSI object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto ADSI nativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the security descriptor for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il descrittore di sicurezza per questa voce.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object that represents the security descriptor for this directory entry.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta il descrittore di sicurezza per questa voce di directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets the provider-specific options for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le opzioni specifiche del provider per questa voce.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration"></xref> object that contains the provider-specific options for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration"> </xref> oggetto che contiene le opzioni specifiche del provider per questa voce.

trans-unit.source: Gets this entry's parent in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento padre di questa voce nella gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the parent of this entry.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta l'elemento padre di questa voce.

trans-unit.source: Sets the password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la password da utilizzare per l'autenticazione del client.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A> and Password properties to specify alternate credentials with which to access the information in Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A>e le proprietà di Password per specificare credenziali alternative accedere alle informazioni in servizi di dominio Active Directory.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Username%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objects retrieved from this instance (for example, through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) are automatically created with the same alternate credentials.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi altro <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>gli oggetti recuperati da questa istanza (ad esempio, tramite <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) vengono creati automaticamente con le stesse credenziali alternative.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The password to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: La password da utilizzare per autenticare il client.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il percorso per questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The path of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso di questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the Active Directory Domain Services properties for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le proprietà di servizi di dominio Active Directory per questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: If the property is not initialized, Properties calls the ADSI interface [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) method to retrieve the value from the cache.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà non è inizializzata, proprietà chiama l'interfaccia ADSI [IADs](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) metodo per recuperare il valore dalla cache.

trans-unit.source: If the underling cache has not been loaded, [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) implicitly calls [IADs::GetInfo](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Se la cache sottostante non è stata caricata, [IADs](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) chiama in modo implicito [IADs](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx).

trans-unit.source: This method loads the values of the supported properties that have not been set in the cache from the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo carica i valori delle proprietà supportate che non sono state impostate nella cache dall'archivio directory sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to Properties retrieves the property values in the cache only.
trans-unit.target: Le chiamate successive alle proprietà recupera i valori di proprietà solo nella cache.

trans-unit.source: To control property cache loading, call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per controllare il caricamento della cache delle proprietà, chiamare <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** The Properties property is not supported for use with the Active Directory Client Extension (DSClient) for [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: **Nota** proprietà proprietà non è supportata per l'utilizzo con l'estensione del Client Active Directory (client servizio directory) per [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.PropertyCollection"></xref> object that contains the properties that are set on this entry.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.PropertyCollection"> </xref> oggetto che contiene le proprietà che sono impostate su questa voce.

trans-unit.source: Loads the property values for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object into the property cache.
trans-unit.target: Carica i valori delle proprietà di questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto nella cache delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Loads the values of the specified properties into the property cache.
trans-unit.target: Carica i valori delle proprietà specificate nella cache delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: An array of the specified properties.
trans-unit.target: Matrice delle proprietà specificate.

trans-unit.source: Changes the name of this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Modifica il nome di questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This will also affect the path that is used to refer to this entry.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Ciò influirà anche il percorso utilizzato per fare riferimento a questa voce.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A> is `true`, be sure to call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method on the new object to make the move permanent.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>è `true`, verificare di chiamare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>metodo sul nuovo oggetto per rendere permanente lo spostamento.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.UsePropertyCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new name of the entry.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo nome della voce.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the schema class for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della classe di schema per questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This is the same as the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Queste sono le stesse di <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.SchemaEntry%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object's schema defines its properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>dello schema dell'oggetto definisce le proprietà e metodi.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The name of the schema class for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della classe di schema per questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema object for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto dello schema per questa voce.

trans-unit.source: An entry's schema determines a list of its mandatory and optional property names.
trans-unit.target: Schema di una voce determina un elenco dei propri nomi di proprietà obbligatorie e facoltative.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to find out what properties and methods are available on the associated object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per individuare le proprietà e i metodi disponibili per l'oggetto associato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the schema class for this entry.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta la classe di schema per questa voce.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache should be committed after each operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se la cache deve essere eseguita dopo ogni operazione.

trans-unit.source: By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, le modifiche alle proprietà vengono apportate in locale in una cache, e vengono memorizzati nella cache dopo la prima di leggere i valori delle proprietà da leggere.

trans-unit.source: When the UsePropertyCache property is `true`, access to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> object's properties is faster.
trans-unit.target: Quando la proprietà UsePropertyCache è `true`, l'accesso al <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>proprietà dell'oggetto è più veloce.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: Setting this to `false` will cause the cache to be committed after each operation.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione di `false` la cache eseguire il commit dopo ogni operazione.

trans-unit.source: If the UsePropertyCache property is `true` and you want to commit cached changes, call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà UsePropertyCache `true` e si desidera il commit nella cache delle modifiche, chiamare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>metodo.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: To update values in the cache after changes to the directory are made, call the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiornare i valori nella cache dopo aver apportato modifiche alla directory, chiamare il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>metodo.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If you call <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A> before calling <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Se si chiama <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>prima di chiamare <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A>, delle modifiche non salvate per la cache delle proprietà andranno perse.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.CommitChanges%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.RefreshCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Internet Information Services (IIS) provider does not support committing the cache after each operation.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Provider Internet Information Services (IIS) non supporta il commit della cache dopo ogni operazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cache should not be committed after each operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la cache non deve essere eseguito il commit dopo ogni operazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome utente da utilizzare per l'autenticazione del client.

trans-unit.source: You can set the Username and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A> in order to specify alternate credentials with which to access the information in Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare il nome utente e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A>per specificare credenziali alternative accedere alle informazioni in servizi di dominio Active Directory.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Password%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> objects retrieved from this instance (for example, through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) are automatically created with the same alternate credentials.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi altro <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>gli oggetti recuperati da questa istanza (ad esempio, tramite <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A>) vengono creati automaticamente con le stesse credenziali alternative.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Children%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The user name to use when authenticating the client.
trans-unit.target: Il nome utente da utilizzare per l'autenticazione del client.
